content: this pattern is based off of the vintage pattern lacet table runner 1 which i could not for the life of me figure out i ve crocheted for years and the pattern and i just didn t get along so i made a version with updated language so that it was doable you can easily adjust this pattern to any length you need you could also adjust for width with some quick calculations 1 https //freevintagecrochet com/doily-patterns/spool67/lacet-table-runner-pattern
